body_html: @zdevito I agree this is a useful mode to have. I'm just saying that we should be careful when designing the API that is to support variables, because one should never mix both modes unless they really know what they're doing. The type system doesn't help in catching those errors at all, and they will lead to memory corruption or segfaults, and that's just going to be an endless source of frustration for the users
